languages.text: {n}Идира хищно улыбается.{/n} "Так вот про что шепотки заходились. Видимо, не сильно тебя Теодора жаловала, раз заточила в консервной банке посреди ничего. Что-то не поделили?"

{n}Idira grins.{/n} "Ah, so that's what's got my whispers all excited. I take it Lady Theodora didn't like you very much since she shoved you into a tin can in the middle of nowhere? You got on her bad side, didn't you?"
languages.original_text: {n}Идира хищно улыбается.{/n} "Так вот про что шепотки заходились. Видимо, не сильно тебя Теодора жаловала, раз заточила в консервной банке посреди ничего. Что-то не поделили?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira grins.{/n} "Ah, so that's what's got my whispers all excited. I take it Lady Theodora didn't like you very much since she shoved you into a tin can in the middle of nowhere? You got on her bad side, didn't you?"

{n}Idira grins.{/n} "Ah, so that's what's got my whispers all excited. I take it Lady Theodora didn't like you very much since she shoved you into a tin can in the middle of nowhere? You got on her bad side, didn't you?"

{n}Idira grins.{/n} "Ah, so that's what's got my whispers all excited. I take it Lady Theodora didn't like you very much since she shoved you into a tin can in the middle of nowhere? You got on her bad side, didn't you?"

{n}Idira grins.{/n} "Ah, so that's what's got my whispers all excited. I take it Lady Theodora didn't like you very much since she shoved you into a tin can in the middle of nowhere? You got on her bad side, didn't you?"

{n}Idira grins.{/n} "Ah, so that's what's got my whispers all excited. I take it Lady Theodora didn't like you very much since she shoved you into a tin can in the middle of nowhere? You got on her bad side, didn't you?"

{n}Idira grins.{/n} "Ah, so that's what's got my whispers all excited. I take it Lady Theodora didn't like you very much since she shoved you into a tin can in the middle of nowhere? You got on her bad side, didn't you?"

languages.text: {n}Idira sonríe.{/n} «Ah, así que eso es lo que ha entusiasmado tanto a mis susurros. Supongo que lady Theodora no le tendría mucho cariño si lo dejó enlatado en medio de la nada. La hizo enfadar, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira grins.{/n} "Ah, so that's what's got my whispers all excited. I take it Lady Theodora didn't like you very much since she shoved you into a tin can in the middle of nowhere? You got on her bad side, didn't you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira sonríe.{/n} «Ah, así que eso es lo que ha entusiasmado tanto a mis susurros. Supongo que lady Theodora no le tendría mucho cariño si lo dejó enlatado en medio de la nada. La hizo enfadar, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉笑了起来。{/n}“啊，怪不得那些耳语那么兴奋。西奥多拉夫人把你塞到铁皮罐头里，丢到了荒郊野外。我猜她可能不太喜欢你，是吧？你惹她不高兴了，对不对？”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira grins.{/n} "Ah, so that's what's got my whispers all excited. I take it Lady Theodora didn't like you very much since she shoved you into a tin can in the middle of nowhere? You got on her bad side, didn't you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉笑了起来。{/n}“啊，怪不得那些耳语那么兴奋。西奥多拉夫人把你塞到铁皮罐头里，丢到了荒郊野外。我猜她可能不太喜欢你，是吧？你惹她不高兴了，对不对？”

languages.text: {n}イディラは笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「あー、だからあたいの囁き声ですっかり興奮したんだ。彼女があなたを何もない場所の空き缶の中に押し込んだということは、シオドーラはあなたのことがとても嫌いだったということが分かるわ。あなたは彼女の機嫌を損ねたんじゃない？」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira grins.{/n} "Ah, so that's what's got my whispers all excited. I take it Lady Theodora didn't like you very much since she shoved you into a tin can in the middle of nowhere? You got on her bad side, didn't you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「あー、だからあたいの囁き声ですっかり興奮したんだ。彼女があなたを何もない場所の空き缶の中に押し込んだということは、シオドーラはあなたのことがとても嫌いだったということが分かるわ。あなたは彼女の機嫌を損ねたんじゃない？」

languages.text: {n}Idira grinst.{/n} "Ah, das hat mein Flüstern so echauffiert. Dann hat Euch Lady Theodora wohl nicht sonderlich gemocht, wenn sie Euch mitten im Nirgendwo in eine Dose gesperrt hat, was? Ihr habt Euch bei ihr unbeliebt gemacht, oder?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira grins.{/n} "Ah, so that's what's got my whispers all excited. I take it Lady Theodora didn't like you very much since she shoved you into a tin can in the middle of nowhere? You got on her bad side, didn't you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira grinst.{/n} "Ah, das hat mein Flüstern so echauffiert. Dann hat Euch Lady Theodora wohl nicht sonderlich gemocht, wenn sie Euch mitten im Nirgendwo in eine Dose gesperrt hat, was? Ihr habt Euch bei ihr unbeliebt gemacht, oder?"

languages.text: {n}Idira esquisse un sourire malicieux.{/n} « Ah, voilà qui explique la fébrilité de mes chers petits murmures. Dame Théodora ne devait pas vous porter dans son cœur, pour vous abandonner dans une boîte de conserve perdue au milieu de nulle part... Qu'avez-vous fait pour vous la mettre à dos ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira grins.{/n} "Ah, so that's what's got my whispers all excited. I take it Lady Theodora didn't like you very much since she shoved you into a tin can in the middle of nowhere? You got on her bad side, didn't you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira esquisse un sourire malicieux.{/n} « Ah, voilà qui explique la fébrilité de mes chers petits murmures. Dame Théodora ne devait pas vous porter dans son cœur, pour vous abandonner dans une boîte de conserve perdue au milieu de nulle part... Qu'avez-vous fait pour vous la mettre à dos ? »

languages.text: {n}İdira sırıtıyor.{/n} "Demek fısıltılarım bu yüzden böyle coşkundu. Seni bu ıssızın ortasındaki bir tenekeye tıktığına göre Leydi Theodora senden pek hazzetmiyormuş... Tersine gittin falan herhâlde."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira grins.{/n} "Ah, so that's what's got my whispers all excited. I take it Lady Theodora didn't like you very much since she shoved you into a tin can in the middle of nowhere? You got on her bad side, didn't you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira sırıtıyor.{/n} "Demek fısıltılarım bu yüzden böyle coşkundu. Seni bu ıssızın ortasındaki bir tenekeye tıktığına göre Leydi Theodora senden pek hazzetmiyormuş... Tersine gittin falan herhâlde."
